attributes.action: Suspended MP's that have said they will stand down at the next general election from parliment without pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A number of MP's have stated they will resign as an MP at the next General Election, over the Expenses scandal.

In order for Parliament to save its reputation as the mother of all modern Parliaments and democracy, we request that those MP’s stepping down are suspended from the house without pay, unless a by election is called in the constituency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
